data.name: Mystic Advent
data.detailed_description:
It is the midcycle of Generation 24XX. As a renowned mystic investigator, acting on intuition and perspective, sets out to assist her divinity guard associates in matters related to a planned attack she ultimately comes up short and late to arrival, with the guard leader spared only for as long as her arrival is due which in turn sets up a divine incursion that seemingly destroys her as the force of integrity is fused on position. But twenty years later across the metaphysical divide on I Alpha, a programming technician wakes up from visions of the incident and (believing it as just a nightmare) proceeds to simply cast if off and goes about his day... until consequences bring forth the same investigative associate who now finds herself many existential worlds away from home. But the problems started upon the world of the investigator’s origination extend deeper than anyone expected, and the divine essence is now threatening to implode upon itself.

CLASSIC GAMEPLAY: Unload special elemental skills, slice 'em with everything to swords and spears (and even handgun ammunition!) and exploit the weakness of your enemies to work on your advantage.
PERSONALITY MATTERS: No actions-say-everything leadership here - in this adventure, EVERYONE has a say in the mission to come.
UNEXPECTED PROVISIONS: From selfless intervention when it matters to unconventional responses from persons and creatures that you wouldn't normally expect it from, expect anything to drop without warning.
ADVENT SPECIALS: Turn the tide to your advantage by unloading special attacks which also boost the capabilities of your associates.
WORLDS OF DANGER: From Echo XXIV's subtropic utopia to Sigma XLII's frigid icecaps, other worlds in the metaphysic expanse begin to play into the divine strategy as the mission progresses.

data.short_description: Twenty years after the fall of divine guardianship, a perfect storm of events results in the return of a seemingly-destroyed mystic investigator to set up a world-crossing advent of divine consequence before all existence is destroyed.
